actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Senate from May 26, or May 27, 1983 to June 6, 1983, and an adjournment of the House from May 26, 1983 to June 1, 1983.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the Senate from May 26 or May 27, 1983, until June 6, 1983, and of the House of Representatives from May 26, 1983, until June 1, 1983.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the Senate from May 26, or May 27, 1983 to June 6, 1983, and an adjournment of the House from May 26, 1983 to June 1, 1983.
